benefits.benefitsControl: Everything related to your identity and your personal data remains in your control.
benefits.benefitsPrivacy: Improved privacy by only revealing the minimum amount of information.
benefits.benefitsReusability: Share as often as you like. No more typing in the same information over and over.
benefits.benefitsPrivacyLaws: Complies to the strictest interpretation of the General Data Protection Act (GDPR).
benefits.benefitsDataResponsibility: Sharing is so easy, storing and protecting customer data is no longer needed.
benefits.benefitsUserExperience: Retain more customers through an enhanced user experience. Less manual typing required.

controlIdentity.whatItIsDetailed: Through Self-Sovereign Identity, people, organizations and things are empowered to collect and share their own verified data and digital identity. This approach increases privacy and control, enabling a “Bring Your Own Identity” (BYOI) style of engagement with corporations, removing the need to perform expensive data collection.

FAQ.question1: Does the IOTA Foundation track my data and usage?
FAQ.answer1: We can’t! This solution puts data control in your hands. We have no way of accessing the data in your wallet. Whenever you share data in the demo environment, you communicate this information to our servers, but it is removed as soon as you complete the demo or close the connection. Also, only functional cookies are used on this website and during the demos. Once companies run demos or applications on their own servers, the IOTA Foundation, and other parties, will not be aware of the usage or data. Data is shared peer-to-peer making it impossible for others to listen in.
FAQ.question2: Can I restore my data if I lose access to my wallet?
FAQ.answer2: Not yet. This is currently a demonstration application, which means it doesn’t have all the features that a full release would have. The application is using (mostly) fake data, therefore recovery is not our priority.
FAQ.question3: Does my personal data get uploaded to the Tangle?
FAQ.answer3: No. In accordance with GDPR regulations, absolutely no personal information is uploaded to the Tangle. Not even in a (pseudo)anonymized state. Because data on the Tangle is immutable, any personal data uploaded to the Tangle would be in violation of the right to be forgotten.
FAQ.question4: How does this application benefit from IOTA and DLT in general?
FAQ.answer4: Organizations sign credentials for the users, but how do we identify the organizations? Their digital identities are uploaded to the Tangle and are signed using asymmetric encryption methods. In addition, revocation of credentials is put on the Tangle as evidence that the credential can no longer be used.
FAQ.question5: On what IOTA network does this application run?
FAQ.answer5: It runs on mainnet. Since IOTA has zero fees, it isn’t any more difficult to run a demo on the mainnet than on the devnet.

answer6.part1: We have released a whitepaper called
answer6.part2: The Case for a Unified Identity
answer6.part3: It is a relatively easy introduction to the subject and explains benefits of IOTA Identity. For a deeper dive into the documentation visit our

FAQ.question7: What is a DLT or Tangle?
FAQ.answer7: Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) is the umbrella term for technologies like Blockchains. It is a decentralized database of which many copies are hosted across the world. They agree with each other on what is true and what isn't through the consensus mechanism. With Bitcoin, this process costs a lot of electricity due to its security model. The IOTA Tangle solves this, making it faster, feeless and green. The Tangle is the underlying data structure of the IOTA network, which hosts the IOTA cryptocurrency token and is developed by the IOTA Foundation.
FAQ.answer8: Selv is developed by the IOTA Foundation in collaboration with different parties. The IOTA Foundation is a non-profit foundation guiding and contributing to the development of the core protocol and facilitating the development of the ecosystem around IOTA.

footer.contactUsLowerText1: Would you like to know how Self-Sovereign Identity can benefit
footer.contactUsLowerText2: your business? Or are you interested in experimenting with the technology?

howItWorks.createText: Choose a compatible wallet and create a unique identifier, representing you online. This profile remains in your control and doesn’t leave the wallet without your consent.
howItWorks.shareText: Decide who and what others get to see from your personal profile. You can share your data peer-to-peer or on request. Controlled data flow allows you to always get something in return for your data.
howItWorks.growText: Gather credentials about yourself, verified by others, to grow your personal identity. Fully under your control and not stored in any database.
howItWorks.acceptText: By accepting BYOI, companies can verify customer data, instantly and for free. This allows you to speed up processes such as onboarding and reduce the amount of typing your customers have to do.

main.mainText: Selv is a demo that showcases how IOTA Identity creates new digital processes and revolutionizes existing ones, with a focus on privacy and control of your own digital Selv.

selv.selvText: Your data shouldn’t be locked up, but it can't be public either.<1/>Selv offers a solution that <3>enables data flow</3>, completely under your <5>control</5>.

actions.orScanCode: Or scan this QR code<1/>to download

general.What it is: Through Self-Sovereign Identity, people, organizations and things are empowered to collect and share their own verified data and digital identity.
general.claimControlReuse: Reuse a Know-Your-Customer (KYC) credential to create a new company. Proof your identity and ownership over your company to open a corporate bank account and liability insurance with the click of a button.

introDemoSelection.shareTrustedCredentials: Collect your COVID-19 testing status after a negative test result. Use this to get back access to the workfloor and international travel.
introDemoSelection.LearnAboutFutures: Plan your environmental legacy, create present and future commitments and complete a pledge.

greatSuccess.signedInDIDText: You managed to sign into a website you never signed up for. Account creation has been skipped saving you time and effort. The company house is also not burdened with saving your password.
greatSuccess.receivedNewCredentialsText: You became the owner of a company. From this point onwards, you would be able to prove your directorship position online, allowing you to act on behalf of the company. Overtime you can grow your Selv profile by gathering such credentials from trusted third parties.
greatSuccess.reusedSelvCredentialsText: By controlling your personal data, you shared verifiable data without having to type it into a form. You can use these same credentials in other processes. Imagine never having to type in your name, address, email etc...

thankYou.savedTime: With Selv, powered by IOTA, you managed to set up an entire company, corporate bank account and insurance with very few clicks. Your data was reusable and this saved you x fields of form fields to fill in.
thankYou.sovereignityText: You have taken full control of your data. You decided who you shared your data with. Did you know that you can share them with others manually via QR as well. Try so in the Selv app!
thankYou.trustText: The data you shared with the Company House and the SNS Bank was verifiable. This allows to verify your data instantly and freely using IOTA as the trust layer.
